Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Crudely manufactured hemispherical vase with a rounded base, slightly unrestricted mouth and simple lip. Its colour is light red and it bears a decorative pattern made using dark red colouring. This colouring covers the entire exterior surface, except for a horizontal band near the lip where non-coloured vertical rectangles alternate with coloured ones. On the interior, this colouring was applied in radiant bands.
